body:
This can be a range for as `for (llvm::Value& arg : function->args())`.

There also needs to be a space after `for` as per the google style guide, but just running clang-format should fix that for you.
body_html:
This can be a range for as for (llvm::Value& arg : function->args()).

There also needs to be a space after for as per the google style guide, but just running clang-format should fix that for you.
body_text:
This can be a range for as for (llvm::Value& arg : function->args()).
There also needs to be a space after for as per the google style guide, but just running clang-format should fix that for you.
